reference.title: Where to find additional information
reference.shortdesc: You can learn more about tasks related to the SolidFire storage system in NetApp SolidFire Documentation Center and from the resources available on the NetApp SolidFire Resources page.

section.p: In the Documentation Center, you can also find information about hardware installation and maintenance, additional content resources available, links to known issues and resolved issues, and the latest release notes.

dlentry.dd: Provides resources about Element software, including links to video content and technical reports.
Provides information about hardware installation and maintenance, additional content resources available, links to known issues and resolved issues, and the latest release notes.
Provides a list of known issues in the current and earlier versions of Element software.
Provides a list of resolved issues in the current and earlier versions of Element software.
